ProcessTemplates.Name: Odoo invoices to UBL with SFTP upload
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template retrieves outstanding invoices from Odoo, transforms them into UBL standard XML format, and uploads the resulting XML files to an SFTP server.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"OdooUrl":{"Value":"\"https://example.com\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The address of the Odoo instance."},"OdooUsername":{"Value":"\"username\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Odoo user."},"OdooPassword":{"Value":"\"password\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Odoo user's password."},"OdooDatabase":{"Value":"\"database\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The name of the Odoo instance."},"OdooArguments":{"Value":"\"[\\r\\n    [\\\"move_type\\\", \\\"=\\\", \\\"out_invoice\\\"],\\r\\n    [\\\"state\\\", \\\"=\\\", \\\"posted\\\"]\\r\\n]\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"List of arguments to pass to the base Odoo request, to filter invoice data. Default gives outgoing invoices with the status \"posted\". Syntax: [[\"field_name\", \"evaluator\", \"value\"], [\"field_name\", \"evaluator\", \"value\"]]."},"OdooFields":{"Value":"\"[\\r\\n    \\\"name\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"invoice_date\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"invoice_date_due\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"invoice_origin\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"company_id\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"partner_id\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"partner_bank_id\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"payment_reference\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"amount_untaxed_signed\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"amount_total_signed\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"amount_residual_signed\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"currency_id\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"payment_state\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"state\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"amount_paid\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"purchase_id\\\",\\r\\n    \\\"invoice_line_ids\\\"\\r\\n]\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"List of fields to pass to the base Odoo request, to determine which data columns to get. "},"OdooInvoiceLimit":{"Value":"\"10\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Maximum value to pass to the base Odoo request, to limit the amount of resulting invoices."},"TargetServerAddress":{"Value":"\"https://example.com\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The address of the SFTP server."},"TargetServerUser":{"Value":"\"username\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user."},"TargetServerPassword":{"Value":"\"username\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user's password."},"TargetDirectory":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server's target directory, to which the invoices are uploaded."}}

Process.Name: Odoo invoices to UBL with SFTP upload
Process.Description: This template retrieves outstanding invoices from Odoo, transforms them into UBL standard XML format, and uploads the resulting XML files to an SFTP server.
